word:
In the evening I walked to the place of meeting and spoke in a large hall to about 100 people. Oh, how my heart yearns to see the people of God coming up to their high calling! I greatly desire that we should have an increase of faith and stand as valiant soldiers of Jesus Christ. I spoke from John 14:1-4.--Ms. 53, 1890, pp. 3-5 (Diary 16, pp. 415, 417). 


                                    -49
